current-chamber.#text: In the House of Representatives, U. S.,

official-title.#text: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 124) making continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2015, and for other purposes.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: ) making continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2015, and for other purposes. All points of order against consideration of the joint resolution are waived. The amendment printed in part A of the report of the

accompanying this resolution shall be considered as adopted. The joint resolution, as amended, shall be considered as read. All points of order against provisions in the joint resolution, as amended, are waived. The previous question shall be considered as ordered on the joint resolution, as amended, and on any further amendment thereto to final passage without intervening motion except: (1) one hour of debate equally divided and controlled by the chair and ranking minority member of the
; (2) the further amendment printed in part B of the report of the
or his designee, which shall be in order without intervention of any point of order, shall be considered as read, shall be separately debatable for six hours equally divided and controlled by
or their respective designees, and shall not be subject to a demand for division of the question; and (3) one motion to recommit with or without instructions.

text.#text: That upon adoption of this resolution it shall be in order to consider in the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is amended by adding the following new paragraph:

text.#text: The provisions of paragraphs (f)(1) through (f)(12) of clause 4 of rule XI shall be considered to be written rules adopted by the Select Committee as though pursuant to such clause.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HRES 722 EH: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 124) making continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2015, and for other purposes.
